properties.name: Life (Early Nineties)
properties.description: Posted by CethirienIthacaI lived, studied, and worked for five years in Gorges Ithaca, New York, cited by Utne Reader as the most enlightened town in America. That was ten years ago, and I am itching to see how this Finger Lakes town is doing today.
